channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: A couple hope their ?400,000 budget will buy them a slice of rural bliss in Moray in Scotland. Plus, Jules Hudson chats to some of the residents of an award-winning village recognised as a world leader in sustainable and holistic community living.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: The Repair Shop
channel.desc: Painting conservator Lucia Scalisi uses her skills to honour a racing legend, and a mechanical doll needs the expert skills of toy restorers Julie Tatchell and Amanda Middleditch.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: The Inner Circle
channel.desc: Amanda Holden hosts the quiz, packed with strategy, high stakes and surprises, where players must outsmart each other to win big. Six players are each randomly assigned a secret stash of cash - anything between zero and a whopping ?4,000.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Pointless
channel.desc: Alexander Armstrong is joined by co-host Trevor Nelson for the brainy quiz where the contestants try to score as few points as possible by plumbing the depths of their general knowledge to come up with the answers no-one else could think of.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC News at Six
channel.desc: The latest national and international news stories from the BBC News team, followed by weather.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC London
channel.desc: News, sport and weather from London.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Party Political Broadcast
channel.desc: A party political broadcast by the Conservative Party.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: The One Show
channel.desc: Vernon Kay brings you the stories that matter from across the country.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: EastEnders
channel.desc: Phil is touched by Julie's support. Suki receives unsolicited advice from her family as she prepares to make a decision. Harry attempts to take matters into his own hands.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: The Repair Shop
channel.desc: The Bear Ladies restore a stuffed monkey that turned royal heads. The team also fix a cake topper emblematic of a circus childhood and a Second World War helmet that survived the Blitz.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: The Celebrity Traitors
channel.desc: Claudia Winkleman greets a group of celebrities as they arrive at a beautiful castle in the Scottish Highlands to play the ultimate reality game of detection, back-stabbing and trust.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC News at Ten
channel.desc: The latest national and international news.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC London
channel.desc: News, sport and weather from London.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Film Club
channel.desc: Best friends Evie and Noa have watched films together since they first met. But now Noa has news which is set to change everything.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Film Club
channel.desc: While Noa attends a taster day for his new job in Bristol, Evie pulls out all the stops for Film Club, there's a lot riding on tonight.
